items.sentence: I don't have anyone to practice my French with.
Friends are people you can think out loud with.
Tom is used to handling this kind of situation.
Nothing makes me happier than seeing you happy.
Nothing makes me happier than seeing you smile.
Do you think most women prefer men with beards?
Maybe I shouldn't have asked Tom that question.
Nothing else will get done until Tom gets here.
Do you think you speak French better than I do?
We've all heard that money can't buy happiness.
After the flood, we couldn't buy food anywhere.
Tom got carried away in the heat of the moment.
Mary opposed her son's decision to get married.
Mary took out a loan in order to pay her debts.
Mary taught her children to be kind to animals.
It'll take us a long time to finish doing this.
You can see the filament inside the light bulb.
Several lights on the console started flashing.
No doubt, Tom will want to thank you in person.
I did it without realizing that I was doing it.
